# Compatibility Docs

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/breaking-changes.md): Learn how to navigate the .NET breaking changes reference.

## .NET 10

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/10.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 10.

## .NET 11

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/11.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 11.

## .NET 5

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/5.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 5.

## .NET 6

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/6.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 6.

## .NET 7

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/7.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 7.

## .NET 8

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/8.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 8.

## .NET 9

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/9.0.md): Navigate to the breaking changes in .NET 9.

## Breaking changes

- [Breaking changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/fx-core.md): Lists the breaking changes from .NET Framework to .NET Core 1.0 - 3.1.

## Breaking changes by version

- [.NET Core 3.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/3.1.md): Lists the breaking changes in version 3.1 of .NET Core and ASP.NET Core.
- [.NET Core 3.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/3.0.md): Lists the breaking changes in version 3.0 of .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, and EF Core.
- [.NET Core 2.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/2.1.md): Lists the breaking changes in version 2.1 of .NET Core.

## Resources

- [Compatibility definitions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/categories.md): Learn about the ways in which code changes can affect compatibility in .NET.
- [Rules for .NET library changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/library-change-rules.md): Learn how .NET attempts to maintain compatibility for developers across .NET versions, and what kind of change is considered a breaking change.
- [API removal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/api-removal.md): Learn about .NET's policy for obsoleting and removing APIs.
